amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-289 to allow the US Export Finance Agency to use surplus funds to expand or establish additional regional finance centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-289 to allow the US Export Finance Agency to use surplus funds to expand or establish additional regional finance centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Ruiz.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ruiz amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
